miniLOL, more than just a CMS -----------------------------
miniLOL is a lightweight Javascript CMS and a javascript framework library that improves on top of Prototype.
Sadly I'm not having enough time to develop it further, there are lots of things I'd like to implement, but well, for the moment it will stay as it is.
